war

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • war.Deck
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Player

    public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a deck of cards - fills with a standard deck of 52 cards by default and is shuffled upon creation.
    Author:
    Lucas Tiedeman, Sean Woerner, Christian Andrada

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck()

      • Deck

        public Deck(int deckSize)
        Parameters:
        deckSize - The desired size of the deck. If deckSize == 52, creates a standard deck, and is otherwise left empty to be filled with custom cards

    • Method Detail
